    GridPane
    class GridPane.BoxListener
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
    The mouseListener applied to each panel in the grid.
    Author:
    elliot gorman

    • Method Summary

      All Methods
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void mouseClicked​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      The 'on clicked method', processes the user's clicks on the panels.
      void mouseEntered​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      When the mouse enters a CirclePanel, takes appropriate action, by highlighting the column and displaying the greyed out piece (if the user hasn't chosen to block the highlights).
      void mouseExited​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      When the mouse enters a CirclePanel, takes appropriate action, by removing the highlighting on the column and the greyed out piece (if the user hasn't chosen to block the highlights).

      • Methods inherited from class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter

        mouseDragged, mouseMoved, mousePressed, mouseReleased, mouseWheelMoved
